00017 W.Creature = function(args){var self = this;
00018   // creature ID; -1 for wall
00019   this.id = 0;
00020   // position coordinate on a world
00021   this.col = 0;
00022   this.row = 0;
00023   this.act = 'hide';
00024   this.actLast = '';
00025   this.dir = 'south';
00026   // u(nit) size; 1 unit = 1 * world.unit
00027   this.uwidth = 1;
00028   this.uheight = 1;
00029   this.udepth = 1;
00030   // internal reference only (need to be private)
00031   this.frame = 0;
00032   this.maxTop = 0;
00033   this.maxLeft = 0;
00034   // sprite animation speed - the smaller, the smoother animation (more CPU time)
00035   this.speed = 6;
00036   // internal reference only (need to be private)
00037   this.actQueue = [];
00038   this.skills = [];
00039   this.add(new W.Skill());
00040   // visual components
00041   this.img = document.createElement('img');
00042   this.img.title = this.id + ' : '+ this.name;
00043   this.img = W.style('img', 'position:absolute;left:-1000px;');
00044   this.body = W.style('div', 'position:absolute;top:0px;left:0px;overflow:hidden;');
00045   this.body.appendChild(this.img);
00046 
00053   this.resize = function(unit){
00054     this.width = this.uwidth * unit;
00055     this.height = this.uheight * unit;
00056     this.depth = this.udepth * unit;
00057     this.body.style.width = this.width +'px';
00058     this.body.style.height = this.height +'px';
00059   };
00060 
00061   // extend/override constructor w/ passed args object
00062   for(var i in args)
00063     eval('this.'+ i +' = args["'+ i +'"];');
00064 };

00080 W.Creature.prototype.add = function(skill){
00081   // allow skill to refer creature it added to
00082   skill.creature = this;
00083   this.skills[skill.name] = skill;
00084 };

00094 W.Creature.prototype.clone = function(){
00095   var clone = new W.Creature();
00096   for(var i in this){
00097     // exclude the HTMLElement members for preventing obj cross referencing
00098     if(i != 'body' && i != 'img')
00099       eval('clone.'+ i +' = this["'+ i +'"];');
00100   }
00101   return clone;
00102 };

00113 W.Creature.prototype.action = function(act){var self = this;
00114   if(act) this.act = act;
00115   // handle cases not require any animation change
00116   if(this.act == 'hide' || this.turnTo(this.act)) return;
00117   var skill = this.skills[this.act];
00118   // perform animation
00119   skill.animate();
00120   // change the animation sprite only if it's needed
00121   if(skill.img != this.img.src)
00122     this.img.src = skill.img;
00123 
00124   // move creature
00125   var bodyPos = 0;
00126   if(this.dir == 'north' || this.dir == 'south'){
00127     bodyPos = parseInt(this.body.style.top);
00128   }else bodyPos = parseInt(this.body.style.left);
00129 
00130   switch(this.dir){
00131     case 'north':
00132       bodyPos -= this.speed;
00133       if(bodyPos >  -this.speed){
00134         changeRow(bodyPos);
00135       }else this.wall();
00136       break;
00137     case 'south':
00138       bodyPos += this.speed;
00139       if(bodyPos < this.maxTop + this.speed){
00140         changeRow(bodyPos);
00141       }else this.wall();
00142       break;
00143     case 'east':
00144       bodyPos += this.speed;
00145       if(bodyPos < this.maxLeft + this.speed){
00146         changeCol(bodyPos);
00147       }else this.wall();
00148       break;
00149     case 'west':
00150       bodyPos -= this.speed;
00151       if(bodyPos > -this.speed){
00152         changeCol(bodyPos);
00153       }else this.wall();
00154       break;
00155   };
00156 
00157   // TODO handle multi-unit creatures
00158   function changeCol(left){var value = 0;
00159     left = (left < 0)?0:left;
00160     if(self.dir == 'east'){
00161       value = Math.ceil(left / self.world.unit);
00162     }else if(self.dir == 'west') value = Math.floor(left / self.world.unit);
00163 
00164     if(value != self.col){
00165       self.moveTo(self.row, value);
00166       var other = self.world.at(self.row, value);
00167       if(other){
00168         self.other(other);  // other creature detected
00169         return;
00170       }else{
00171         self.world.matrix[self.row][value] = self.id;
00172         self.world.matrix[self.row][self.col] = -1;
00173         self.col = value;  // change col prop.
00174 
00175         // manage actionQueue
00176         if(self.actQueue.length != 0)  // check any reserved act
00177           self.act = self.actQueue.shift();  // check out next action
00178       }
00179     }
00180     self.body.style.left = left +'px';  // move body
00181   };
00182 
00183   function changeRow(top){var value = 0;
00184     top = (top < 0)?0:top;
00185     if(self.dir == 'south'){
00186       value = Math.ceil(top / self.world.unit);
00187     }else if(self.dir == 'north') value = Math.floor(top / self.world.unit);
00188 
00189     if(value != self.row){
00190       var other = self.world.at(value, self.col);
00191       if(other){
00192         self.other(other);  // other creature detected
00193         return;
00194       }else{
00195         self.world.matrix[value][self.col] = self.id;
00196         self.world.matrix[self.row][self.col] = -1;
00197         self.row = value;  // change row prop.
00198         // adjust zIndex
00199         self.body.style.zIndex = value;
00200         // manage actionQueue
00201         if(self.actQueue.length != 0)  // check any reserved act
00202           self.act = self.actQueue.shift();  // check out next action
00203       }
00204     }
00205     self.body.style.top = top +'px';  // move body
00206   };
00207 };

00216 W.Creature.prototype.moveTo = function(row, col){
00217   var other = this.world.at(row, col);
00218   if(!other){
00219     this.world.matrix[row][col] = this.id;
00220     this.world.matrix[this.row][this.col] = -1;
00221     this.row = row;  // change col prop.
00222     this.col = col;  // change col prop.
00223 
00224     // manage actionQueue
00225     if(this.actQueue.length != 0)  // check any reserved act
00226       this.act = this.actQueue.shift();  // check out next action
00227   }else this.other(other);  // other creature detected
00228 };

00230 
00239 W.Creature.prototype.turnTo = function(op){
00240   switch(op){
00241     case 'rturn':
00242       var direction  = ['north', 'east', 'south', 'west'];
00243       this.dir = direction[Math.floor(Math.random() * 4)];
00244       return true;
00245     case 'left':
00246       switch(this.dir){
00247         case 'north': this.dir = 'west';  break;
00248         case 'south': this.dir = 'east';  break;
00249         case 'east':  this.dir = 'north'; break;
00250         case 'west':  this.dir = 'south'; break;
00251       };
00252       return true;
00253     case 'right':
00254       switch(this.dir){
00255         case 'north': this.dir = 'east';  break;
00256         case 'south': this.dir = 'west';  break;
00257         case 'east':  this.dir = 'south'; break;
00258         case 'west':  this.dir = 'north'; break;
00259       };
00260       return true;
00261     case 'backward':
00262       switch(this.dir){
00263         case 'north': this.dir = 'south'; break;
00264         case 'south': this.dir = 'north'; break;
00265         case 'east':  this.dir = 'west';  break;
00266         case 'west':  this.dir = 'east';  break;
00267       };
00268       return true;
00269     case 'north':
00270     case 'east':
00271     case 'south':
00272     case 'west':
00273       return true;
00274     default:  // operation not commnads any direction change
00275       return false;
00276   };
00277 };

00304 W.Creature.prototype.wall = function(){
00305   this.reserve(this.ifWall);

00324 W.Creature.prototype.play = function(scenario){
00325   scenario += '';
00326   this.actQueue = scenario.split(',');
00327 };

00336 W.Creature.prototype.reserve = function(scenario){
00337   scenario += '';
00338   this.actQueue = this.actQueue.concat(scenario.split(','));
00339 };
